abstract: The London headquarters of HSBC Holdings was bought by the Spanish real estate company Metrovacesa for 1.09 billion pounds ($2.2 billion), a record for a British building.
lead_paragraph: The London headquarters of HSBC Holdings was bought by the Spanish real estate company Metrovacesa for 1.09 billion pounds ($2.2 billion), a record for a British building.

headline.main: HSBC Sells London HQ in Record Deal
